entry.title: Alligator Interrupts Kayak Fishing Challenge | Lake Holcomb
entry.summary: I set out for a challenge to catch fish on lures that I've never caught fish on before. I also do a Stand Up Test on my Lifetime Tamarack Angler kayak. With all of this, a big alligator shows up just as I'm getting…
entry.content:
I set out for a challenge to catch fish on lures that I've never caught fish on before. I also do a Stand Up Test on my Lifetime Tamarack Angler kayak. With all of this, a big alligator shows up just as I'm getting settled in a cove. That's after rescuing a baby bird, then on to a large snake swimming right through my fishing spot. Needless to say, it's a heavy wildlife day while kayak fishing. Come on for the ride!

#alligator #kayakfishing #fishingchallenge

entry.title: Lifetime Tamarack Kayak Seat Upgrade
entry.summary: I have started doing tournaments and the seat needed some work. I do a kayak seat modification and upgrade by building a wooden cradle for my new stadium seat on my Lifetime Tamarack Angler kayak. Puts me up off of the boat better, allows…
entry.content:
I have started doing tournaments and the seat needed some work. I do a kayak seat modification and upgrade by building a wooden cradle for my new stadium seat on my Lifetime Tamarack Angler kayak. Puts me up off of the boat better, allows me to see further and it's just all-around more comfortable.

entry.title: Kayak Fishing for BIG Bass! Spring Creek Nature Preserve
entry.summary: Spring is upon us, which means it's even more of a great time to be out on the water! I had a few hours to get the yak out and try to get onto some fish. Nice blow-up on a topwater and then a…
entry.content:
Spring is upon us, which means it's even more of a great time to be out on the water! I had a few hours to get the yak out and try to get onto some fish. Nice blow-up on a topwater and then a biggun' on a Z-Man chatterbait. Be sure to watch the beginning and the end, as I got a new logo made and two different variations. See the comments about it!

#kayakfishing #bassfishing #bigbass

entry.title: Bank Fishing for Bass (Redear Sunfish) at Lake Holcomb
entry.summary: Trying some spring time bank fishing. It's rough, I'm not gonna lie, but I don't get skunked. I throw a bunch of different lures to then switch over to nightcrawlers and bring in a couple of nice panfish...you know...the gateway drug of fishing! It…
entry.content:
Trying some spring time bank fishing. It's rough, I'm not gonna lie, but I don't get skunked. I throw a bunch of different lures to then switch over to nightcrawlers and bring in a couple of nice panfish...you know...the gateway drug of fishing! It was cold and windy, but still nice to be out on the water at Lake Holcomb.

#bankfishing #springfishing #panfish

entry.title: 2019 Riverwalk Bass Tournament with my Daughter and Dad
entry.summary: My daughter, Dad, and I fish the 2019 Riverwalk Bass Tournament. We have a great time and catch a few keepers. All in all, we had a TON of laughs! Topwater bite was good on Ribbit Frogs, then moved to a Z-Man Black &…
entry.content:
My daughter, Dad, and I fish the 2019 Riverwalk Bass Tournament. We have a great time and catch a few keepers. All in all, we had a TON of laughs! Topwater bite was good on Ribbit Frogs, then moved to a Z-Man Black & Blue Chatterbait. Come with us on the journey and get ready to laugh!

#bassfishing #fishingwithfamily #fishingtournament

entry.title: Kayak Bass Fishing Tournament | SETXKBL Round 3 | Lake Conroe - March 2019
entry.summary: Round 3 SETXKBL Lake Conroe Kayak Bass Fishing Tournament. I finally get to participate in my first kayak bass fishing tournament. I joined the SouthEast Texas Kayak Bass League (SETXKBL) and launch from Stubblefield along with James Penny. I try topwater at first, then…
entry.content:
Round 3 SETXKBL Lake Conroe Kayak Bass Fishing Tournament. I finally get to participate in my first kayak bass fishing tournament. I joined the SouthEast Texas Kayak Bass League (SETXKBL) and launch from Stubblefield along with James Penny. I try topwater at first, then several things before I finally hook up with a barely-legal keeper largemouth bass. I then hook onto a nice white bass. Follow the action as I make my first tournament appearance and start getting some Angler of the Year points on the board. I came in 43rd place out of 53, so I didn't come in dead last! But first time out gave me some great experience for the next one!

#kayakfishing #bassfishing #basstournament

entry.title: Fattest Bullhead Ever! Huge Multi-Species Day on the Kayak! | Lake Holcomb Crappie, Bass and Catfish
entry.summary: I take the kayak out to Lake Holcomb and catch a TON of fish! Literally the fattest bullhead catfish I have EVER seen! It is a great trip with a great outcome. I get a bit rained on....ok it pours on me, but that's…
entry.content:
I take the kayak out to Lake Holcomb and catch a TON of fish! Literally the fattest bullhead catfish I have EVER seen! It is a great trip with a great outcome. I get a bit rained on....ok it pours on me, but that's fishing. Come along and see all of the action and the catches! This is what kayak fishing is all about!

entry.title: Winter Fishing with my Son
entry.summary: I take my youngest son for some rainy weather fishing at March's Pond. We try a bunch of different things, but it's really about the good time we had, even with the crummy weather. Fishing didn't turn out too well, but it was a…
entry.content:
I take my youngest son for some rainy weather fishing at March's Pond. We try a bunch of different things, but it's really about the good time we had, even with the crummy weather. Fishing didn't turn out too well, but it was a fun and hilarious time!

entry.title: SETXKBL Kayak Bass Fishing Tournament Prefishing | Lake Conroe | LifeFlight on the Water
entry.summary: I head out to Lake Conroe for some prefishing for the South East Texas Kayak Bass League (SETXKBL) Round 3 tournament. My FIRST kayak bass fishing tournament! It's a rough day, very windy, going out of LakeView Marina, which is right on the main…
entry.content:
I head out to Lake Conroe for some prefishing for the South East Texas Kayak Bass League (SETXKBL) Round 3 tournament. My FIRST kayak bass fishing tournament! It's a rough day, very windy, going out of LakeView Marina, which is right on the main body of water. The bite was tough, but I got to see some LifeFlight water rescue training while I was out. I'll be fishing the tournament on March 23rd.
